website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and prepared to withstand as much as 250 pounds of weight during a disaster.
pros: Designed for preparing for home disasters  as well as the rugged outdoors
Holds up to 20 pounds of food
Individual storage units can be stacked easily on top of one another for increased capacity

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. Can’t tell if it’s the lid or crack in the plastic. Ugh, didn’t check it within 30 days. Just getting emergency preparedness kit together. Must remember to buy from Target or other store with better return policy. What a waste! So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kito

customer_reviews.title: durable/well made construction
customer_reviews.text: you need to torque these things down like crazy to keep a tight seal, and the lid isn't especially easy to do that with. I have 20 and even after cranking down on them 10 of them still leak. they seem quite durable though, and stack together well.
customer_reviews.author: Monique F.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks when laid on the side.
customer_reviews.text: Four out of the six I bought leak when laid on the side have to store them upright.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product. We have two filled with water tucked in by our front door in case of an emergency. It's easier to clean than most jugs. I'll change the water every month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Erickson

customer_reviews.title: We love these containers
customer_reviews.text: We love these containers! We have a small 1.5 car garage but still wanted an emergency water supply. These are easily stackable and don’t take up a ton of space. They will also be great for our camping trips for easy water transportation that won’t leak like our water coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Lladnar

customer_reviews.title: Well made piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water storage I’ve used. It is quick to fill and empty because of its big opening, and you can even clean the inside. The shape is great for carrying, filling and pouring, and stacking feature is clever although I only have one. The only negative is that you have to screw the top on pretty darn tight to prevent leaks. It looks like a good seal in there, but it still leaked on me until I re-tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Alley
customer_reviews.text: We live in coastal South Carolina. Hurricanes and earthquake potential necessitate having an emergency water & food supply. Used to store water in gallon jugs but took up too much room & the jugs degraded over time. Bought two of these & they are perfect for our needs. Takes up minimal space. No leakage. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: S. Garren

customer_reviews.title: Good insurance policy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have containers to put some water in for "Just in case". Wife and I are in mid 60s and not able to lug around the 5 gal jugs anymore. These are 3 gal and much easier to fill, carry and store. Watched You Tube videos on the Aqua Brick vs Water Brick. Aqua Brick was hands down winner in my opinion. Bought 4 of them to put under the stairway. Make sure the lid is on properly and there are no leaking issues. A little expensive but like they say, buy one, cry once and not have to buy again. Bought 2 of Aqua Brick spickest to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: J.Carpy75

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak
customer_reviews.text: Filled the container, placed in my bathtub on top of paper towels. Checked it a few times in the first hour and then again after it sat overnight. It did not leak. I also then proceeded to dump 30-40% of the water out. Put the lid back on and shook it back and forth to see if it would leak from the sloshing. Leak FREE!. The plastic looks super durable and lets in 0 light. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: jon8linden

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for emergency water for earthquakes
customer_reviews.text: Great container, which we are using to store water in case of emergencies, such as an earthquake in California. The product is great. No chemical smells. It holds a lot of water, such that with 6 containers our family can go a week without water in an emergency. I use the container for drinking water when working for 1-2 days in remote locations, leaving it in the back of the truck. Would give this a 5-star rating if it was a little more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid requires design revisions.
customer_reviews.text: The container itself is great. Easy to lift and carry. The lid requires further design work. They leak. When I tighten it down, the lid goes beyond tightening and becomes loose again. I have discovered that if I only put 2 to 2.5 gallons in and raise the lid end so the water sits below the lid, the leaking ceases. The spiget is an issue too. See spiget reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Jan

customer_reviews.title: They Leak!
customer_reviews.text: Beware -- Make sure to test if AquaBricks leak. I ordered 5, 2 leaked. It's a big hassle to have to return these, it's not an Amazon direct return, you're supposed to deal with the seller. Too bad because the shape of them and everything else is otherwise good. The whole point of buying a water container is for the water to be contained. I can't believe the quality control is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This thing holds 2.5 gallons of H2O!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Always carried the 5 gallon containers which added weight and I never used all of the water I was traveling with on multi day river raft trips or just car camping. Downsized to these and they work well for me for a weekend vehicle supported camping trip. Seals well during transport. I highly recommend & they are so easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: RaddyGuy

customer_reviews.title: A must have IMO
customer_reviews.text: there are sooooo many situations where you may not have any running water, or you have to leave your home in an emergency, and you need to bring water with you... this is super easy and great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been camping for 50 plus years. The usual water jugs you get at hardware and camping stores are just crap. These jugs are strong, leakproof and durable. I like the 3.5 gallon size since they are not too heavy. Yes, they are pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for over a year. No problems. Everything else I tried broke and dumped water within a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Katie33kate

customer_reviews.title: Have it ready and on hand for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Fill it up and store it in your closet; it is ready to go on a moment's notice during an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: It Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The lid leaks when lying on the side. We also had a "waterbrick" brand container which had the same size lid. We tried that lid and it fixed the leak. Pity, since I liked the handles and design of the aquabrick better.
customer_reviews.author: michael boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to carry water. I can't handle a 5 gallon bucket full of water but this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

product_meta.title: Sagan Life AquaBrick Water Storage Containers, Portable Stackable Container Holds 3 Gallons Water, 20 lbs Dry Goods, Camping, Food Storage & Water Storage, BPA Free (1 - Container)
product_meta.description: The AquaBrick Container is a multi-use storage container. Ideal as a water storage container, it holds 3 gallons of water; and 20 lbs of food as a food storage container. The innovative design of the AquaBrick Containers make them ideal for food storage and water storage as these stack-able storage containers can be used in a variety of configurations. The multi use containers will fit easily into any emergency storage area. These handy multi-purpose containers are also an integral part of the AquaBrick Water Purification System (not included). Easy to pour and empty out completely. Easy to carry, clean and use. Water tight and have useful strap-down grooves on the sides. The AquaBrick is MADE IN THE USA Details: Made of BPA Free High Density/High Impact Polyethylene Plastic Empty Brick Weight: 2.36 Lbs / 1.07 Kg Volume: 3 Gallons / 11.35 Liters Dimensions: 9"W x 18"L x 6"H / 22.86 cm x 45.72 cm x 15.24 cm AquaBrick uses: Water Storage, Food Storage, Dry Storage, Camping, Hunting, Fishing, Picnics, Boating/Kayaking, 72 Hour Emergency Kits, as an Ice Block, Ammo Storage, Document Storage, ATV/Pack, Horse Storage Pack, etc.
feature_bullets: ✅100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. EXTREMELY DURABLE Container is a multi-use storage container built for the unpredictability of emergency situations. Can withstand the weight of a 250 lb man standing on it. Holds 3 gallons of water storage and 20 lbs. of food / dry goods / ammo as a storage container.

✅ STURDY, STACKABLE STORAGE containers can be used in a variety of configurations. Stay locked together even in times of disaster. Wide mouth opening makes the AquaBrick easy to fill, easy to clean. Double handles make it super easy to carry, pour and transport. Empties out completely.

✅ DESIGNED FOR LONG TERM STORAGE. The AquaBrick is designed for Water Storage, Food Storage, Dry Storage, Camping, Hunting, Fishing, Picnics, Boating - Kayaking, 72 Hour Emergency Kits, as an Ice Block, Ammo Storage, Document Storage. Ideal pet food storage containers, easy to fill and pour.

✅ EMERGENCY READY. Rubber gasket cap creates a tight seal making the AquaBrick storage container air and watertight; UV Resistant. Has useful strap-down grooves on the sides. Thick HDPE protects your storage from being crushed or damaged.✅

✅ FDA GRADE - BPA FREE Water Storage Container. High Density/High Impact Polyethylene Plastic. No harmful chemicals will leach into your water storage – MADE IN THE USA **Integral part of the AquaBrick Purification System** (NOT INCLUDED)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
